backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profile access control and CRUD operations plus multiple match record types and conversion to a unified API format.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented files to feature requirements, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten descriptions summarizing key frontend React components, pages, and hooks used throughout the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables for light/dark modes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, themes, and authentication gating for all app routes including game modes and history pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication wrapper that shows a login welcome screen until the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity auth and clearing cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component with header, footer, login button, routed content, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Button and confirmation dialog to delete a match and navigate or trigger callback after deletion.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Dialog for ending and saving a match, handling loading state and confirmation.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Clickable card showing match mode, date, players, and optional stats, navigating to match details.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: Card displaying a game mode with icon and description, linking to start a new game.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider handling authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and matches through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme tokens.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Provides builders for APA practice, Accepting Gifts, and Straight Shot match records, generating match IDs and timestamps.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Runs the Accepting Gifts session UI, managing score state, rules panel, and saving completed sessions.
Shows the rules and explanation for the Accepting Gifts drill inside a UI card.
Collects player name and notes to initialize an Accepting Gifts session and stores it in sessionStorage.
Handles APA practice gameplay including scoring, innings, and saving match results.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Gathers player names, target score, and notes to start an APA practice match and saves initial state.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Displays match details with players, mode, date, and stats, handling loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Shows a filterable list of past matches with tabs by mode and navigation to home.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the app home screen with navigation cards for different practice modes and match history.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Manages an active straight-shot session, recording shots, tracking streaks, and saving the match.
Collects initial player info and creates a new straight-shot session in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON describing the projectâ€™s current state, including version info, existing feature definitions, and high-level app goals for multiple pool practice modes. It lists implemented features, requirements, and metadata for planning.
